a: Annual Investment Allowance usually gives 100% tax relief on most plant & machinery (caps apply). Always ask about computers, tools, office furniture.
Class 2 NI counts towards State Pension and some benefits; ensure paid if applicable.
If last year’s self assessment bill > £1,000 and <80% at source, HMRC usually sets two payments on account (Jan/Jul). Prior POAs reduce current balancing payment.
Relief given as a tax credit equal to 20% of allowable interest; interest is deductible for the reducer, but relief is capped at 20%.
Corporation tax usually due 9 months + 1 day after year end; file CT600 to HMRC; file accounts to Companies House (auth code).
